response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I kindly propose a purchase price of $14,000 for this product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it will bring to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this deal happen.", "product_price": 14000}
